title: Challenges in assessing and managing multi-hazard risks: A European stakeholders perspective
content:
Publication date: July 2024

Source: Environmental Science & Policy, Volume 157

Author(s): Robert Šakić Trogrlić, Karina Reiter, Roxana L. Ciurean, Stefania Gottardo, Silvia Torresan, Anne Sophie Daloz, Lin Ma, Noemi Padrón Fumero, Sharon Tatman, Stefan Hochrainer-Stigler, Marleen C. de Ruiter, Julius Schlumberger, Remi Harris, Sara Garcia-Gonzalez, María García-Vaquero, Tamara Lucía Febles Arévalo, Raul Hernandez-Martin, Javier Mendoza-Jimenez, Davide Mauro Ferrario, David Geurts
